title: Misleading description in German Masteries

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: In the German Client the [description of "Meditation"](http://imgur.com/a/SeE1g) in the Masteries is wrong. It says you regenerate 1.5% of you missing HEALTH every 5 seconds instead of missing mana.

replies.body:
Hey HanYolo1! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here. ^-^
